title: Hakaima Sadamitsu (Sadamitsu the Destroyer)
synopsis: Sadamitsu, a high-school delinguents turned to a masked-hero, while not dealing with his rocky relationship with the strong female protagonist, he puts on a motorcycle-helmet-like mask and becomes a semi-robotic superhero who fights. He is assisted by other possibly- mechanical creatures in order to save the earth from the invasion of 20,000,000 escaped alien convicts.
staff: [['Ohata, Koichi', ['Director', ' Series Production Director']], ['Sokuza, Makoto', ['Episode Director']], ['Tanaka, Rie', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Iwasaki, Taku', ['Theme Song Arrangement', ' Music']]]
